description:
Newly renovated one bed apartment in a beautiful landmark building. Atlantic Avenue, Court street, Smith Street, Montague street are all packed with incredible bars, restaurants and shops. 
Transport is provided by the F (Bergen Street) or the 4, 5, 2, 3 and R (Borough Hall). Manhattan is just one stop away. Cobble hill and neighboring Brooklyn Heights, Boerem Hill, Carroll Gardens and Columbia Waterfront are brimming with activities and the typical brownstone treelined streets .
name: Modern one bed in traditional Cobble Hill
review: Leanne is so very responsive, sweet, and amazing host! This location has cute little restaurants and great access to the subway to head Uptown to many tourist attractions. I loved staying in this apartment with my significant other.
